subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Charitable Man will make his 3-year-old debut during Saturday’s Grade 1, $750,000 Blue Grass Stakes at Keeneland and was made the 4-1 third choice and drew the No. 9 post in the field of 11. Charitable Man has not raced since sustaining a fracture in his shin while training in September, cutting short a promising 2-year-old campaign.
